subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: This year, Evernham Motorsports will become the first Nextel Cup team to use robotics to assemble small parts and ultimately weld the frame of the “Car of Tomorrow.”
snippet: This year, Evernham Motorsports will become the first Nextel Cup team to use robotics to assemble small parts and ultimately weld the frame of the “Car of Tomorrow.”
